== Perole (CT) (627170) ==

Perole (CT) is a town in the [[Hosdurg]] taluka of [[Kasaragod]] district with an area of 13.61 sq. km. and harbouring 3748 households with total population of 14965 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kasaragod]] is at a distance of 48 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 600 km. Male population is 7125 and female population is 7840. Scheduled Caste population is 543 and Scheduled Tribes population is 32. Census Location Code of the town is 627170<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 12 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 153 km. Railway station is at Nileshwar at a distance of 1 km.
